rlDevContStreamingModeCfg_t Struct Reference

Continous streaming mode configuration. More...

#include <control/mmwavelink/include/rl_device.h>

Data Fields

rlUInt16_t contStreamModeEn
 Enable - 1, Disable - 0.
 
rlUInt16_t dataTransSize
 Sample count. This refers to the number of samples per
channel. The max allowed value allowed values depending
on other configurations (No. of channels enabled and
real/complex data). Ex: It is 8192 for real only mode one
channel, and 4096 for complex mode one channel.
.
 

Detailed Description

Continous streaming mode configuration.
